description: The absolute must-have on the mountain. This triple-layer hardshell jacket with a waterproof Gore-Tex membrane boasts so many smart features: a helmet-compatible hood, zippers for underarm ventilation, and cleverly positioned pockets that offer easy access even with a harness on. Utterly timeless, the Crater HS Hooded Jacket boasts a classic alpine design.
name: Mammut Crater HS Hooded Jacket - Mens
